actions.description: Gives the player a penalty. Penalty can not be greater than the max score of the step.

properties.name: Penalty
properties.description: Penalty for failing this action

actions.description: This action checks if any or all listed events are triggered.

properties.name: Events
properties.description: Write the name of the event(s) which will be checked.

properties.name: AnyOrAll
properties.description: Choose if the game will check for all your events to exist, or for any one of them.

properties.description: Should the user click on any or all of the listed targets

properties.name: Delay

actions.description: This kills all other active sibling steps in the current linear step. It still completes all other actions left in the current non-linear step.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Used for linking lessons

properties.name: Delay
properties.description: Delay before the action will execute

actions.description: The EndLevelAction ends the level and shows the score gained by the user

properties.name: ForceFail
properties.description: When checked this makes sure the user will fail the level no matter what

properties.name: NoMissedOpportunitiesMessage
properties.description: The message that will be displayed when the user has no missed opportunities

properties.name: PassedFeedback
properties.description: Feedback that is given when the lesson is passed, leave empty when no feedback should be given

properties.name: FailedFeedback
properties.description: Feedback that is given when the lesson is failed, leave empty when no feedback should be given

properties.name: Title
properties.description: Title on the dialog

properties.name: Content
properties.description: Content of the dialog

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Used for linking lessons

properties.name: Delay
properties.description: Delay before the action will execute

actions.description: This action ensures that selected interactables will be hidden in the game

properties.name: Targets
properties.description: The interactables that will be hidden in the game

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Used for linking lessons

properties.name: Delay
properties.description: Delay before the action will execute

actions.description: Start an audio clip either in the world or from an interactable game object.

properties.name: Loop
properties.description: If the audio should loop.

properties.name: Volume
properties.description: How much should the volume dampen? 75 means you hear 75% of the volume you would normally hear.

properties.name: Channel
properties.description: Which Audio channel available in the project should be used to play this audio clip.

properties.name: AudioClip
properties.description: The audio sound played

properties.name: AudioName
properties.description: The name of the audio file, this name is used as a reference to be able to stop the audio. Overrides the audio if the name is already used.

properties.name: Target
properties.description: The Interactable from where the audio is played

properties.name: MaxDistance
properties.description: Maximum distance is the distance the volume is decreasing to in a linear line

properties.name: MinDistance
properties.description: Minimal distance the volume is at 100% of the volume set in the volume property

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Used for linking lessons

properties.name: Delay
properties.description: Delay before the action will execute

actions.description: Shows a popup dialog with a question and answers.

properties.name: Title
properties.description: The questionnaire title this action refers to.

properties.name: QuestionText
properties.description: The questionnaire text to show in the question field.

properties.name: QuestionMedia
properties.description: The questionnaire image to show in the question field.

properties.name: MultipleAnswers
properties.description: If you can choose multiple answers during the questionnaire or you can choose only one answer.

properties.name: Answer1HideAnswerIngame
properties.description: If answer number 1 should appear in the questionnaire.

properties.name: Answer1Text
properties.description: The text which appears in the answer number 1.

properties.name: Answer1Media
properties.description: The image which appears in answer number 1.

properties.name: Answer2HideAnswerIngame
properties.description: If answer number 2 should appear in the questionnaire.

properties.name: Answer2Text
properties.description: The text which appears in the answer number 2.

properties.name: Answer2Media
properties.description: The image which appears in answer number 2.

properties.name: Answer3HideAnswerIngame
properties.description: If answer number 3 should appear in the questionnaire.

properties.name: Answer3Text
properties.description: The text which appears in the answer number 3.

properties.name: Answer3Media
properties.description: The image which appears in answer number 3.

properties.name: Answer4HideAnswerIngame
properties.description: If answer number 4 should appear in the questionnaire.

properties.name: Answer4Text
properties.description: The text which appears in the answer number 4.

properties.name: Answer4Media
properties.description: The image which appears in answer number 4.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Used for linking lessons

properties.name: Delay
properties.description: Delay before the action will execute

actions.description: Handles the default response of a questionnaire.

properties.description: The questionnaire title this response action refers to.

actions.description: Handles specific response of a questionnaire.

properties.name: QuestionnaireTitle
properties.description: The questionnaire title this response action refers to.

properties.name: Answer1Selected
properties.description: If answer number 1 should have been selected in the questionnaire, in order to run this response action.

properties.name: Answer2Selected
properties.description: If answer number 2 should have been selected in the questionnaire, in order to run this response action.

properties.name: Answer3Selected
properties.description: If answer number 3 should have been selected in the questionnaire, in order to run this response action.

properties.name: Answer4Selected
properties.description: If answer number 4 should have been selected in the questionnaire, in order to run this response action.

actions.description: A popup window, which gives information and/or instructions in form of video/image/text.

properties.name: DialogTitle
properties.description: The title, which will appear on the of the dialog.

properties.name: DialogDescription
properties.description: The description, which will appear in the dialog.

properties.name: DialogSubtitle
properties.description: The subtitles, which will appear in the dialog.

properties.name: Media
properties.description: The Media which will appear in the dialog. Could be Image, Video or empty, which will result in only the Title, Subtitle and Description being shown.

properties.name: AutoCloseTimer
properties.description: If this number is more than 0, the dialog will close after that many seconds.

actions.description: Lets the user listen and read instructions and comments from the game.

properties.name: TextToSpeech
properties.description: The punctuated text to speech text.

properties.name: TextToSpeechAudio
properties.description: The TTS audio file

properties.name: SelectedVoice
properties.description: The TTS audio voice.

properties.name: Repeatable
properties.description: If the TTS can be repeated by the user.

properties.name: InstantComplete
properties.description: If true the TTS action will be listened normally, but it will not wait for it to end and immediately call its Finished event and continue on to the next action.

properties.description: Used for linking lessons

properties.name: Delay
properties.description: Delay before the action will execute

actions.description: This action starts a timer with the specified duration in seconds

properties.name: TimerDuration
properties.description: The duration of the timer that should be created. Format is in seconds

properties.name: RunInBackground
properties.description: Should this timer run in the background?

properties.name: ShowInUI
properties.description: Should this timer be visible on the screen?

properties.name: TimerName
properties.description: The name of the timer that is going to be used.

action_categories.name: Audio
action_categories.description: This category includes actions that will control audio (play/stop) in the game

action_categories.name: Instruction
action_categories.description: This category includes actions that will instruct the player. Think of Text To Speech (TTS).

action_categories.name: Interaction
action_categories.description: This category includes actions that need input or response from the player. Think of it as tasks where you have to do something, like clicking a button or typing in information

action_categories.name: Level Flow
action_categories.description: This category exist with actions that controls the flow of your level.

action_categories.name: Scoring
action_categories.description: This category exist with actions that controls level scoring.

action_categories.name: Timers
action_categories.description: This category includes actions that make use of timers
